room_id_not_exists.message: The room Id "%s" does not exist.

subscription_not_found.message: No subscription found on index %s and collection %s.

rooms_attribute_type.message: The rooms attribute must be an array.

incorrect_state_value.message: Incorrect value for the 'state' parameter. Expected: all, done or pending. Got: %s.

incorrect_scope_value.message: Incorrect value for the 'scope' parameter. Expected: all, done or pending. Got: %s.

incorrect_users_value.message: Incorrect value for the 'users' parameter. Expected: all, done or pending. Got: %s.

missing_subscription_parameter.message: Cannot subscribe without an index and a collection.

limit_minterms_reached.message: Unable to subscribe: maximum number of minterms exceeded (max %s, received %s).

limit_unique_rooms_reached.message: Unable to subscribe: maximum number of unique rooms reached.

cant_unsubscribe_unknown_user.message: Unsubscribe error: no subscription found for that user.

import_data.message: Some data was not imported for %s/%s (%s/%s).

dump_already_generated.message: A dump is already being generated. Skipping.

invalid_plugin_name.message: [%s] Invalid plugin name. The name must be comprised only of lowercased letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.

invalid_privileged_property.message: [%s] Invalid "privileged" property: expected a boolean, got a %s.

invalid_user_object.message: You must provide a valid User object when adding context with as().

callback_argument_expected.message: Invalid argument: Expected callback to be a function, received "%s".

missing_request_object.message: Invalid argument: a Request object must be supplied.

invalid_custom_event_name.message: Custom event invalid name (%s). Colons are not allowed in custom events.

missing_request_data_or_object.message: A Request object and/or request data must be provided.

invalid_strategy_registration.message: [%s] Strategy %s: dynamic strategy registration can only be done using an "authenticator" option (see https://tinyurl.com/y7boozbk).

plugin_initialization_failed.message: Something went wrong during initialization of "%s" plugin.

strategy_description_type.message: %s expected the strategy description to be an object, got: %s.

methods_property_type.message: %s expected a "methods" property of type "object", got: %s.

methodname_property_type.message: %s expected a "%s" property of type "string", got: %s.

invalid_strategy_method.message: %s the strategy method "%s" must point to an exposed function.

invalid_property_type.message: %s expected the "%s" property to be of type "string", got: %s.

missing_config_property.message: %s expected a "config" property of type "object", got: %s.

cannot_set_ctor_and_authenticator.message: %s the "authenticator" and "constructor" parameters cannot both be set.

authenticator_property_type.message: %s expected an "authenticator" property of type "string", got: %s.

expected_object_type.message: %s expected the "%s" property to be of type "object", got: %s.

invalid_fields_property_type.message: %s expected the "fields" property to be of type "array", got: %s.

plugin_threw_non_kuzzle_error.message: Plugin %s pipe for event '%s' threw a non-Kuzzle error: %s.

verify_dont_return_promise.message: %s expected the "verify" to return a Promise, got: %s.

invalid_authentication_kuid.message: %s invalid authentication kuid returned: expected a string, got a %s.

unkown_kuzzle_user_identifier.message: %s returned an unknown Kuzzle user identifier.

cannot_remove_others_plugin_strategy.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: owned by another plugin.

cannot_remove_unexistant_strategy.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: strategy does not exist.

incorrect_controller_description_type.message: %s Incorrect controller description type (expected object, got: "%s").

http_verb_not_allowed.message: %s Only following http verbs are allowed: "%s". %s

strategies_plugin_property_empty.message: %s the exposed "strategies" plugin property must be a non-empty object.

authenticators_plugin_property_not_an_ob.message: %s the exposed "authenticators" plugin property must be of type "object".

unable_to_load_plugin_from_directory.message: Unable to load plugins from directory "%s"; %s.

unable_to_load_plugin_from_path.message: Unable to load plugin from path "%s"; %s.

privileged_mode_not_supported.message: The plugin "%s" is configured to run in privileged mode, but it does not seem to support it.

privileged_mode_not_setted.message: The plugin "%s" needs to run in privileged mode to work, you have to explicitly set "privileged: true" in its configuration.

missing_typename_property.message: The typeName property must be defined in the validation type object.

missing_function_validate.message: The type %s must implement the function 'validate'.

missing_function_validatefieldspecificat.message: The type %s must implement the function 'validateFieldSpecification'.

missing_function_getstrictness.message: The allowing children type %s must implement the function 'getStrictness'.

object_format_error.message: All levels of an object have to be defined in the specification.

type_not_allowed.message: The field type %s is not allowed to have children fields.

parent_field_not_defined.message: The parent field of the field "%s" is not defined.

invalid_formats_option.message: Invalid "formats" option: must be a non-empty array.

invalid_range_type.message: Invalid "range.%s" option: must be of type "number".

unable_to_parse_range_value.message: Unable to parse the range value "%s".

values_option_cannot_be_empty.message: Option "values" must be a non-empty array.

invalid_values_format.message: Values must be of type "string". Invalid value%s: %s.

shapetypes_option_cannot_be_empty.message: Option "shapeTypes" must be a non-empty array.

invalid_length_type.message: Invalid "length.%s" option: must be of type "number".

validator_specification_of_collection_er.message: Validator specification of the collection %s.%s triggered an error

object_level_undefined_in_specification.message: All levels of an object have to be defined in the specification.

process_already_running.message: A process is already running for this sandbox

timeout.message: Timeout. The sandbox did not respond within %sms.

invalid_limits_configuration_format.message: Invalid config.limits configuration format: please check your Kuzzle configuration files

value_out_of_range.message: Invalid configuration: value set for "%s" limit is outside the allowed range

concurrentRequests_superior_to_requestsB.message: Invalid configuration: the concurrentRequests limit configuration must be strictly inferior to requestsBufferSize

requestsBufferWarningThreshold_out_of_ra.message: Invalid configuration: limits.requestsBufferWarningThreshold should be comprised between limits.concurrentRequests and limits.requestsBufferSize
